name: The SHELTER Wildcrafting Bag for Villagers
description:
We're so excited to announce a special collaboration with a dear friend of ours, Natalie from Villagers.  Villagers is an urban homesteading shop/community space here in Asheville.

Introducing the SHELTER Wildcrafting Bag for Small Terrain.  It has everything that the modern forager needs.  Made of a durable waxed canvas with leather straps, and a large, two-chamber removable and washable liner. Enough pockets in front for your hori hori knife, Opinel, and whatever else you may need.  Pockets on each side for jars so berries or fragile specimens can be taken home safely to identify.  Pocket on the back for your field guide.  Adjustable leather shoulder straps with pads for comfort.  Straps on the bottom of the backpack for willow and twig collection.

This is the only wild crafting bag you will ever need, and just in time.  Happy foraging!

+ Cove green waxed canvas shell

+ Emerald Teal contrast and removable lining

+ Vegetable tanned leather straps from all domestic hides. Adjustable straps.

+ All brass hardware

+ Approximately 17" x 15" x 5"

name: The Westwood Purse in Cove Green Waxed Canvas with Black Star Ikat and Whiskey Tan Leather
description:
Meet our most versatile purse - The Westwood. Fits everything you need for the day-to-day, with two roomy pockets within for your phone, cards, keys, and photo of your sweetheart, but perfect for a night out too. Can also easily fit an ipad for a Sunday morning at the coffee shop. Easy closure with beautiful whiskey tan aged leather from domestic hides. Adjustable heavy leather strap.

+ Cove green waxed canvas shell with black star ikat contrast

+ Emerald teal lining with two roomy pockets

+ Aged leather front strap and adjustable shoulder strap from domestic hides.

+ All brass hardware

+ Approximately 14" x 10" x 1"

name: The Prospect Pouch in Cove Green Waxed Canvas
description:
The Prospect Pouch is the perfect gift for you or your sweetheart. Perfectly fits your phone and some cash, snacks, or whatever other little goodies you may need throughout the day. 

+ Cove green waxed canvas shell 

+ Terra Cotta canvas lining

+ Two tiny compartments on the front

+ Soft leather wrap tie from domestic hides

+ Nickel plated brass grommet

+ Approximately 6" x 5.5"


This listing is for one Prospect Pouch.

name: The Taplin Purse in Black + White Star Ikat with Cove Green Waxed Canvas
description:
Named after good friends of ours in Vermont, the Taplin Purse embodies all of the same qualities that the Taplins do - fun, bright, and sophisticated, with a strong sense of self.

Made with black and white star ikat on the front, cove green waxed canvas on the back, and emerald teal canvas lining with welt pocket. Leather is an aged whiskey-brown leather from a North American tannery.

The perfect mid-sized bag for all of your necessities, day or night!

+ All brass hardware with simple Sam Brown closure

+ Rich brown leather from all domestic cows

+ Adjustable strap (40" - 32") with brass buckle hardware.

+ Welt pocket inside

+ Measures approximately 12" across and 8" tall

name: The Rolston Bag in Cove Green Waxed Canvas and Cream Waxed Canvas Contrast
description:
This is the perfect laptop or book bag for men and women. Named after a gentle winding road in the Green Mountains, this lovely little attaché reminds us of those perfect summer days in Vermont, riding bikes along the dirt road in our bathing suits after a dip in Blueberry Lake.

As seen in NYLON Magazine. 


+ Made from a sturdy and durable cove green waxed canvas, with a cream waxed canvas highlight on the top of the flap. 

+ Hand cut and oiled vegetable tanned leather straps and handle from US Tannery. Leather pads for comfort. Adjustable straps fits most sizes. 

+ Lined with a dusty jade brushed twill to protect your worldly possessions. Perfect for your laptop and some papers, or for your favorite book and a photo of your best bud. A welt pocket inside for your planner or wallet.

+ Six small pockets on the front hold your little notebook, keys, and a couple dollars for a cup of tea with a friend.

+ Small silver hook inside for your keys. No more rummaging around at the bottom of your bag to find them.

+ Silver buckle details keep your belongings safe and secure.

+ Approximately 18" x 18"

+ Unisex

name: The Rolston Bag in Charcoal Waxed Canvas and Bright Terra Cotta Contrast
description:

+ Hand cut and oiled vegetable tanned leather straps and handle from US Tannery. Leather pads for comfort, adjustable straps fits most sizes. 

+ Lined with a a bright terra cotta canvas lining to protect your worldly possessions, perfect for your laptop and some papers, or for your favorite book and a photo of your best bud. A welt pocket inside for your planner or wallet in the same fabric as the flap highlight.

name: The Prickley Mountain Bag in Charcoal Waxed Canvas and Terra Cotta Canvas Highlight
description:
The charcoal waxed canvas makes the Prickley Mountain Bag durable and handsome, the bright terra cotta highlight makes it yours. The all hand cut, hand oiled and waxed leather is veg tanned and from North American hides. The hardware is brass for beauty and strength. The long shoulder strap is adjustable and removable, so you can wear it cross body, on your shoulder, or carry it like a briefcase.
Stud closures on the front to keep your belongings safe.

Fits a 15” MacBook perfectly, with just enough room to spare for the cord and a small notebook. One divider within makes two compartments. Bright terra cotta lining.


+ Approximately 14” tall x 9.5” wide x 1.5" deep

+ Heavy waxed canvas shell

+ Contrasting canvas lining

+ Bright terra cotta highlight on the front

name: The Shelburne Purse in Tan Waxed Canvas with Whiskey Tan Leather
description:
Shelburne Farms. The most lovely place to sit in the grass overlooking Lake Champlain, chat with a friend about all those details that make life so good, and hopefully catch a glimpse of some adorable wild animal.

This sweet little clutch is simple, smart, and pretty. Made from a bark tan waxed canvas base with a hemp chambray contrast. A smooth whiskey-tan leather makes up the flap, and it's finished with a brass stud closure for easy access. 

+ Tan Waxed Canvas base

+ Emerald teal lining

+ Removable leather strap to carry it as a clutch. US leather.

+ Approximately 9.5" x 5.5"

name: The Shelburne Purse in Hemp Chambray with Bark Tan Waxed Canvas and Whiskey Tan Leather
description:

+ Hemp Chambray Contrast 

+ Chambray lining and patch pocket

+ Removable leather strap to carry it as a clutch. US leather.

+ Approximately 9.5" x 5.5"

name: The Plunkton Pack in Waxed Canvas Backpack with Tangerine US Denim
description:
The Plunkton Pack // Waxed Canvas Backpack with Leather + Bright Contrast

We take Plunkton Road to the lake; a bumpy windy dusty oversized path that meanders through the mountains, passing waterfalls and wild mushrooms along the way.

The Plunkton Pack is our newest (and favorite) day trip bag.  We use a heavy waxed canvas for the shell of the bag, and add a bright hand dyed highlight to make it yours.  Each is unique. Drawstring leather closure makes it easy to access your belongings.  
The North American veg tanned leather is oiled, waxed, and treated with care.  It will take the weather with grace and age kindly. The bottom of bag and straps are in leather, and the straps are adjustable to most heights.  All brass hardware, and heavy brass clip within for your keys.

Waxed canvas ages so beautifully, almost like leather. This bag is rugged enough for a day hike or picnic by the river, and elegant enough for night out or staying with a friend for the weekend.  We take ours everywhere.

Approximately 17” tall x 13” wide (round base so dimensions variable)
Drawstring closure
Brass hardware
Hand oiled and waxed US veg tanned leather for straps, string and base
Adjustable leather straps
Waxed canvas with hand dyed highlight using made in the USA heavy natural denim

name: The Plunkton Pack in Tan Waxed Canvas with Bright Eye Print
description:
We take Plunkton Road to the lake; a bumpy windy dusty oversized path that meanders through the mountains, passing waterfalls and wild mushrooms along the way.

The Plunkton Pack is our newest (and favorite) day trip bag.  We use a heavy waxed canvas for the shell of the bag, and add a bright geometric highlight to make it yours.  Each is unique. Drawstring leather closure makes it easy to access your belongings.  
The North American veg tanned leather is oiled, waxed, and treated with care.  It will take the weather with grace and age kindly. The bottom of bag and straps are in leather, and the straps are adjustable to most heights.  All brass hardware, and heavy brass clip within for your keys.

Waxed canvas ages so beautifully, almost like leather. This bag is rugged enough for a day hike or picnic by the river, and elegant enough for night out or staying with a friend for the weekend.  We take ours everywhere.

+Approximately 17” tall x 13” wide (round base so dimensions variable)

+Drawstring closure

+Brass hardware

+Hand oiled and waxed US veg tanned leather for straps, string and base

+Adjustable leather straps

+ Tan waxed canvas with bright yellow and orange eye print

name: The Warren Wallet in Vegetable Tanned Leather
description:
The Warren Wallet in Natural // Hand Cut, Oiled + Waxed Veg Tanned Leather w/ Brass

A new take on our classic Warren Wallet in Natural.  Hand cut, oiled and waxed veg tanned leather ages gracefully and beautifully.  Will age to lovely cognac color over time.  Stamped with the SHELTER logo on the front.  Simple closure using leather and brass rivets.  All brass hardware.  Small loop on back so you can wear it on your belt.  

Approximately 8” wide x 4” tall

name: SHELTER Gift Certificate // $50
description:
We know how it can be SO hard to find the perfect gift, so we're making it easy on you! This little baby is perfect for the holidays, birthdays, weddings, bridal showers, just because someone's awesome, or for last minute presents that need to be great.

This gift certificate will be emailed to you as a pdf file. Please be sure you have a pdf reader installed - If you do not have this capability, you can download one for free from www.adobe.com.


Please note:

* This gift certificate is valid only in ShelterProtectsYou's BigCartel shop, and it is only redeemable here.

* For orders that exceed the certificate amount, the difference must be paid at the time of purchase via PayPal.

* Any remaining value on the gift certificate after purchase will be redeemable as store credit for up to one year.

* This gift certificate is not redeemable for cash.

* The gift certificate expires one year from the date of issue.

*** To redeem this certificate, contact us via email with your .pdf gift certificate attached.
